name: Halloween Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Happy Happy Halloween!

Gibbon Labs presents:
The ultimate Halloween Jigsaw Puzzle

Welcome in the world of Kiuna the Witch.
Kiuna must urgently find a way to get her youth back
because her friend Merlin will visit her soon.
Finally she found a solution in her grimoire.
So she sends out Benben her little assistant toy.
He must go down to the town where the giant Halloween
party takes place tonight.
His job is to capture the fear-screams from all the
people who get scared by all the Halloween monsters
and creatures running around in the town.

Just solve all the puzzles now and see what happened.
Happy Happy Halloween!


Features:
- Multilanguage support for all languages
- 16 pictures telling a great Halloween story
- Help buttons if you stuck
- Improves your hand eye coordination
- Shows solved picture in full screen.
- Save solved puzzle pictures as wallpaper background
- Have hours and hours of jigsaw fun with the whole family
- Fun for all ages
- Never ever again loose a puzzle piece
- No in app purchases!
- No Internet access needed!
- No Ad-Banners while playing
